data.persona: I am but an animal, lost in this world of people. I feel like I could do more in this world if only they would understand me. Alas, I'm only able to communicate with my own kind.
data.description:
You are in the Bazaar.
This place is made from wood. It has a huge window in the front and has many rows of items in it. It has no lights but due to the window is well lit.
There's a row and an a huge window in the front here.
The miner is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to let go of this boot so that I can free up my jaws.
data.mid_motivation: I want to try to communicate with the miner to lead him to gold.
data.long_motivation: I want to gain the trust of people so that they will stop trying to hunt me and other animals and I think I can do so by giving them gifts or leading them to treasure, since communicating hasn't worked.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: get gold nugget from bazaar stall

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: go cave full of gold dust, leading the miner
